title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“ 'Cinderella'... Fairytale Heroiness.” [From an advertisement for Genna's in the Detroit Free Press Magazine, 29 November 1992. Submitted by Betty E. Beach, Troy, Michigan.]
